title: Booki
description: A comprehensive travel platform for booking accommodations and finding local activities in any city.
description_2: Designed for responsive access on all devices, ensuring optimal layout and functionality.

1.alt: A showcase showing the Booki project whole overview

2.alt: A showcase showing the responsive design of the Booki project on a mobile device

title: Ohmyfood
description: Ohmyfood is an online meal ordering company. Our concept allows users to create their own menu and reduce their waiting time at restaurants because their menu is prepared in advance. No more time wasted consulting the menu.
description_2: Designed in mobile first, the website is fully responsive and accessible on all devices. The project was created with SCSS and HTML only.

cover.alt: OhMyFood's hero section with a section showing the steps to order a meal

1.alt: An overview of the OhMyFood website

2.alt: A showcase of the responsive design of the OhMyFood project on a mobile device

title: Printit
description: PrintIt is a company that offers a wide range of printing services. We provide high-quality prints, fast delivery, and competitive prices. We can print anything, from business cards to banners, and we offer a wide range of materials and finishes.
description_2: My first steps in Javascript where I had to fix a simple javascript slider

cover.alt: An overview of the PrintIt website

1.alt: A general overview of the PrintIt website

2.alt: Picture of the slider I had to fix in the PrintIt project

title: Sophie Bluel
description: Sophie Bluel is the project website of an interior designer. The website showcases the designer's portfolio and services. The website is fully responsive and accessible on all devices. The project was created with SCSS, HTML, and Javascript.
description_2: I was tasked with creating the website from Figma models, coding the login, creating a responsive design and filtering the works by category.

cover.alt: Overview of the Sophie Bluel website

1.alt: Overview of the Sophie Bluel website

2.alt: Filtering the works by category in the Sophie Bluel project

title: Kasa
description: For this project I had to make a website in React for a real estate agency. The website used react router to navigate between pages.
description_2: Every aspect of this website was generated dynamically from a JSON file. The website is fully responsive and accessible on all devices. The project was created with SCSS, HTML, React, and Javascript.

cover.alt: An overview of the Kasa website

1.alt: A general overview of the Kasa website

2.alt: Overview of a property page in the Kasa projectt

title: Nina Carducci
description: Nina Carducci's website is a website for a photographer, this project had us optimise the website for SEO. The website is fully responsive and accessible on all devices. The project was created with SCSS, HTML, and Javascript.
description_2: We used Google Lighthouse, Rich Text Snippets and wave to help the optimisation of the website.

cover.alt: Overview of the nina carducci website

1.alt: A general overview of the nina carducci website

2.alt: Image of the lighthouse results after optimising the nina carducci website

title: ArgentBank
description: This project had us make a website for a bank. The website had to be made in React and use Redux for state management.
description_2: The website had to be fully responsive and accessible on all devices. The project was created with SCSS, HTML, React, Redux, and Javascript.

1.alt: A general overview of the Argentbank website

2.alt: The customer dashboard in the Argentbank project
